channel.title: Request
channel.description:
Hello, I was looking for someone to make me an award, like me have here for the mods, etc. I was looking for a one like the size of the forum awards on here. I would like it so say "Knife Champ" and have a picture of a knife in it.
Cheers.

item.title: Request
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:12, topic:195074”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=259463.msg2158876#msg2158876 date=1207290299]
Probably for a forum based on Counter-Strike. Or some video game with Melee attacks.
[/quote]

Basically all FPS’ have Melee attacks…[/quote]

And that’s why I gave a general description of it. Why go into listing all of the games with them. Not all of them, but many. I didn’t say FPS either, I said Video Game.

Read full topic

item.title: Request
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:9, topic:195074”]Ehm. I believe this is quite the wrong section for such a topic. Please ask a Moderator to relocate this topic.

Ahahaha. Even if this topic were moved I still wouldn’t bother with his request.[/quote]
His request has already been done though…
And his request is stupid already. What’s so great about knives. I guess it’s good cause it helps you cut your wrists and turn EMO.

But yea… why would you want the award of a Knife Champ…?

Read full topic
